name: The Afternoon Delight
desc: The flagship banana, the captain banana, the grand tour: All 3 dips swirled together and topped with nuts and graham crackers.

name: The Cookie Crumble
desc: Oreos + chocolate chip mingle for your amusement. Your choice of dip.

name: The Joe Banana
desc: Crushed coffee beans on a banana! Whoa! Exciting! This will make you have a good day! You won’t be able to use any punctuation! (approximately one step down from delivering caffeine intravenously). Toffee and Cinnamon included upon request - our version of cream and sugar.

name: Peanut Butter Pie Banana
desc: Dipped in vegan chocolate, topped with creamy peanut butter over a graham cracker base.

name: The Milly Vanilly
desc: Vanilla base with a decadent chocolate half-dip on top. Your choice of topping. (also works with other dip choices)

name: The GOB
desc: A celebration of everything revolutionary, irreverent, Arrested Development-al, and excessive. Two whole bananas, stuck together, double-dipped in shining chocolate glory, with extra nuts. This banana will laugh back at you if you can’t finish it. (Rhymes with Lobe)
